meanings.sent1: The autoradiographic image showed where the radioactive substance was located.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used autoradiographic techniques to study the distribution of radioactivity.
meanings.sent3: The autoradiographic process made the experiment look like a glowing puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her autoradiographic findings illuminated the hidden patterns in the data.
meanings.sent5: The autoradiographic film captured the invisible traces of radiation.

meanings.definition: A technique used in scientific research to track the distribution of radioactive substances in a sample.
meanings.sent1: The autoradiographic revealed the movement of the radioactive material.
meanings.sent2: Researchers relied on autoradiographic methods to analyze the sample.
meanings.sent3: The autoradiographic process felt like playing hide-and-seek with radioactivity.
meanings.sent4: Using autoradiographic techniques, scientists followed the radioactive trail.
meanings.sent5: The autoradiographic study provided a visual map of the radioactive elements.
